snippet.title: The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante | Trailer
snippet.description:
The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante is a narrative-driven RPG set in a gritty world where a person's Lot is determined at birth, while the gods are real and preside over the fates of men. Set out on a lifelong journey and become an individual able to carve out their own destiny. Will you become a judge, an inquisitor, or conspire against the old order? Only you decide!

Add to your Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1272160/The_Life_and_Suffering_of_Sir_Brante/
